title: This Elderly Man Tips Servers With *WHAT*?! + Ditch Or Date Update
description:
We have talked about how important it is to tip your servers. But there's always going to be someone who doesn't agree with tipping. In this case, it's the grandfather of Bert's friend.
Why doesn't he tip? Because he thinks it's better to tip with life advice than money.
Has this ever happened to you? If so, we want to hear what someone tipped you instead of money.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
